Author: Microsoft Developer
Description:
In this episode of the #AzureEssentialsShow, Aaron Stark and Maria Jose Fernandez explore how #AzureHybridBenefit can help organizations maximize cloud savings, maintain hybrid capabilities, and simplify their migration to Azure.

By the end of this episode, you will learn: • How to leverage existing software licenses with Azure Hybrid Benefit to reduce cloud costs and avoid duplicate spending. • The flexibility offered by Azure Hybrid Benefit for migrating workloads at your own pace, including dual use rights and minimal downtime. • How to combine Azure Hybrid Benefit with Azure Reservations for greater savings, plus where to access learning resources and interactive demos
